entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Vaudreuil-Dorion
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:39 a.m. EDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then rain. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
